mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS (PK_CORP, PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, FEETYPE, PAY_MANNER, PAY_MONTH, START_DATE, END_DATE, PAYABLE, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_NOTES, INVOICE_STATUS, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE_COMPANY, PAY_TIME, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, STATUS, RECORDS_ID, PK_WY_FEE, PK_FEE_TYPE) VALUES (#{pk_corp}, #{propertyFeePayDetails}, #{houseInfoId}, #{clientName}, #{costType}, #{payManner}, #{payMonth}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{payable}, #{paidIn}, #{voucherNumber}, #{invoice}, #{invoiceNumber}, #{invoiceNotes}, #{invoiceStatus}, #{collectingCompany}, #{collectingAccount}, #{invoiceCompany}, #{payTime}, #{carteTime}, #{updateTime}, #{customerId}, #{status}, #{recordsId}, #{propertyFeeId},#{pk_feeType} )
mapper.select: SELECT PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, FEETYPE, PAY_MANNER, PAY_MONTH, START_DATE, END_DATE, PAYABLE, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_NOTES, INVOICE_STATUS, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE_COMPANY, PAY_TIME, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, STATUS, RECORDS_ID, PK_WY_FEE FROM T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS

SELECT PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, FEETYPE, PAY_MANNER, PAY_MONTH, START_DATE, END_DATE, PAYABLE, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_NOTES, INVOICE_STATUS, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE_COMPANY, PAY_TIME, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, STATUS, FEETYPE, RECORDS_ID, PK_WY_FEE FROM T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS

SELECT a2.*,RN FROM ( SELECT a1.*,ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID, T_PROJECT_INFO.PROJECT_NAME, T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS."vhcode", CLIENT_NAME, FEETYPE, PAY_MANNER, PAY_MONTH, START_DATE, END_DATE, PAYABLE, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_NOTES, INVOICE_STATUS, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE_COMPANY, PAY_TIME, CARTE_TIME, T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS.UPDATE_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS.STATUS, RECORDS_ID, PK_WY_FEE FROM T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS JOIN T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS ON T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS."pk_house" = T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS.HOUSE_INFO_ID JOIN T_PROJECT_INFO ON T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS."pk_project" = T_PROJECT_INFO.PK_PROJECT JOIN T_MANAGE ON T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS.MANAGE_ID = T_MANAGE."pk_manageId" JOIN T_MANAGE_USER ON T_MANAGE_USER.MANAGE_ID = T_MANAGE."pk_manageId"
ORDER BY PAY_TIME DESC ) a1 WHERE ROWNUM <=#{endNum} )a2 where RN >#{startNum}
SELECT "account" FROM T_BANK_ACCOUNT JOIN T_FEE_TYPES ON T_FEE_TYPES."pk_fee" = T_BANK_ACCOUNT."pk_fee" WHERE "feecode" = #{feeType} AND T_FEE_TYPES."pk_corp" = #{pk_corp}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID) FROM T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS JOIN T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS ON T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS."pk_house" = T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS.HOUSE_INFO_ID JOIN T_PROJECT_INFO ON T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS."pk_project" = T_PROJECT_INFO.PK_PROJECT JOIN T_MANAGE ON T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS.MANAGE_ID = T_MANAGE."pk_manageId" JOIN T_MANAGE_USER ON T_MANAGE_USER.MANAGE_ID = T_MANAGE."pk_manageId"

-- 公司主键，项目主键，房产主键，客户主键，费用数据主键，收费项目主键，实收金额 SELECT T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS.PK_CORP AS pk_corp, T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS."pk_project", HOUSE_INFO_ID AS pk_house, CUSTOMER_ID AS pk_customerid, PK_WY_FEE AS pk_receivablesid, PK_FEE_TYPE AS pk_feetype, PAID_IN AS nmny FROM T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS JOIN T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS ON HOUSE_INFO_ID = T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS."pk_house" WHERE RECORDS_ID = #{id}
